markdownRemark.html: Spanish So Simple is private & group Spanish lessons currently held at Alanda Club, Elviria, Marbella taught by English graduate with 36 years experience. "Spanish So Simple " method includes audio-visual flashcards downloadable onto computers & mobile. Each lesson is well designed using an interactive method for learning that is engaging and motivating. The flashcard format provides both visual and auditory prompts and tracks your progress on each module.
